The biggest and maybe most important data point here is that the Afghan Parliament is... in flux. There was supposed to be an election this year (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afghan_parliamentary_election,_2015 ), but it looks like that might not happen until next year. Despite the need for elections, there is still a Parliament (http://www.nytimes.com/2015/06/20/world/asia/afghan-parliaments-term-is-extended-after-squabbles-delay-elections.html ), but there's some question as to the legitmacy.
